PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Leeched creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. The leech gains half the lost HP as #yBlock. Leech wears off after #b2 turns.
Enraged creatures gain #yStrength when a #ySkill is played.
Creatures with Slow take more damage the more cards you play in a turn. Slow resets at the start of your turn.
Body Parts are #b0 cost cards with a variety of effects. They Exhaust when played.
